amendment.description: To make available up to $5,000,000 for the Joint Test and Training Rapid Advanced Capabilities (JTTRAC) Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3517 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3517 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S7376-7377; text: CR S7376) To make available up to $5,000,000 for the Joint Test and Training Rapid Advanced Capabilities (JTTRAC) Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3517 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3517 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Nelson FL.
